casebody.data:
Donald W. ABSHIRE and The Other Petitioners Named Herein
v.
The STATE of Louisiana, through the Department of Insurance of the State of Louisiana; The Department of Insurance of the State of Louisiana; The State of Louisiana, through the Office of Financial Institutions of the State of Louisiana; The Office of Financial Institutions of the State of Louisiana; The Louisiana Insurance Guaranty Association; and Standard Analytical Service, Inc. and All Consolidated Cases NO. 2018-00979 Supreme Court of Louisiana. October 8, 2018

Denied.
